meta.description: Show the avatar of an user
meta.target: The user which you want to show the avatar of
meta.extension.description: The file format you want to have the avatar in

meta.amount.description: The amount of messages you want to delete

content.error: The messages are older than 14 days, thus they cannot be deleted

meta.opponent.description: The opponent you want to play against

meta.description: Change the config of the bot for this server
meta.language.description: View or change the language for this server
meta.language.language.description: The language you want to set for this server
meta.welcome.description: Define a welcome-channel in which new users should be greeted
meta.welcome.define.description: Define a channel in which new users should be greeted
meta.welcome.channel.description: The channel in which new users should be greeted
meta.welcome.reset.description: Reset the welcome channel so new users won't be greeted anymore
meta.counting.description: Define a counting (game) channel in which users can count up
meta.counting.define.description: Define a counting channel where the counting game can be played
meta.counting.channel.description: The channel in which users can count up

content.language.success_set: The language has been successfully set to {{language}}
content.welcome.already_defined: This is already the welcome channel!
content.welcome.success_set: The welcome-channel has been successfully set to {{channel}}
content.welcome.success_reset: The welcome-channel has been successfully resetted!
content.counting.already_defined: This is already the counting channel!
content.counting.success_set: The counting-channel has been successfully set to {{channel}}. Please note that only numbers can be send in that channel!
content.counting.success_reset: The counting-channel has been successfully resetted!

meta.description: Shows you the remaining time till specific dates
meta.date.description: The date you want to show the remaining time of

content.invalid_date: Invalid date entered! Please use the following format: `DD.MM.YYYY`
content.error_future: Please enter a date in the future

meta.description: Shows all commands of this bot
Generates a image with a quote
meta.user.description: Generates a quote from a Discord user
meta.person.description: Generates a quote from a real person
meta.person.image.description: The URL of the image you want to use for this quote

meta.description: Sends a random thing of what you defined
meta.type.description: The thing you want to randomize
